io.micronaut.data.hibernate.operations

Class HibernateJpaOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.data.hibernate.operations.HibernateJpaOperations
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.context.ApplicationContextProvider, JpaRepositoryOperations, AsyncCapableRepository, PrimaryRepositoryOperations, ReactiveCapableRepository, RepositoryOperations

    @EachBean(value=org.hibernate.SessionFactory.class)
public class HibernateJpaOperations
extends java.lang.Object
implements JpaRepositoryOperations, AsyncCapableRepository, ReactiveCapableRepository
    Implementation of the JpaRepositoryOperations interface for Hibernate.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
